title: Philippine BPO Locations
name: Philippine BPO Locations
description:
A Map by Mnpc2312

The Philippines is located in the heart of Asia within four hours of most major capitals in the region. Situated at the junction of the eastern and western business, it is a critical entry point to over 500 million people in the ASEAN market and a gateway to American businesses.
Major BPO destinations located throughout the country are easily accessible. Daily and hourly flights to and from the major cities are available and numerous international airports are also being developed.

properties.name: BACOLOD
properties.description: Posted by Mnpc2312Four call centers were established in Bacolod this year. These facilities are managed by international companies such as Teleperformance, TeleTech and local call center companies - IO Asia and Focus Pacific. Access Bacolod�s airport has daily flights to and from Cebu City and Manila. Bacolod City Domestic Airport is located 4 kilometers away from the city\'s downtown area. Bacolod is 50 minutes from Manila by plane and 30 minutes from Cebu City. Advantage Bacolod�s low operational costs make it an ideal location for BPO. Its vibrant economy, adequate transportation, developed communication infrastructure, and the congeniality and superior training of its human resource makes it a promising center for investments. The city boasts of a 93.9% literacy rate with 10 universities and colleges and two IT training institutions.

properties.name: BAGUIO CITY
properties.description: Posted by Mnpc2312The Americans established Baguio in 1900. The city was planned according to American architect Daniel Burnham which was further improved with parks and public structures such as Wright Park, Burnham Park, Governor Pack Road, Session Road, and Assumption Road. The city was then declared as the Summer Capital of the Philippines. The popular Camp John Hay used to be the rest and recreational facility for the military and Department of Defense of the United States. Access Domestic flights to/from Manila daily are available daily. Advantage Baguio has turned cyber-ready with the firing-up of a digital fiber optic link. The city is now connected to a 10 gigabit per second data pipe through the digital fiber optic network (DFON). The city is home to one of the country�s most profitable Philippine Economic Zone Authority: the Baguio City Economic zone. . It is also a college town with eight institutions of higher education with two ranked as among the country�s top 10. The city�s numerous educational centers promise a large pool of human resource for BPO operations.

properties.name: CAGAYAN DE ORO
properties.description: Posted by Mnpc2312Cagayan de Oro City is the center of education in Northern Mindanao. It is base to multinational companies Del Monte Philippines and was recently promoted as the ICT goldmine of the country. The city is also known for its white water rafting and river trekking. Access The Lumbia Airport provides flights to and from Manila and Cebu. It is an hour and twenty-five minutes away from Manila and an hour and ten minutes from Cebu. The Laguindingan International Airport is also being built to provide international flights to South Korea and other parts of the world. Advantage Cagayan de Oro has strategically located international seaports, modern telecommunication facilities, adequate infrastructure and a highly efficient educational system. The city is a prime location for cost-effective air, land and sea transit. It is also known as a University Town with 11 universities and colleges.

properties.name: CEBU CITY
properties.description: Posted by Mnpc2312Cebu is one of the oldest cities in the country and is the second most important metropolitan center in the country. It is known as the Queen City of the South. The city is also the center, outside of the capital, of international flights into the country and is the most important center of commerce, trade, and industry in the southern parts of the Philippines--Visayas and Mindanao. Access The city�s Mactan-Cebu International Airport provides direct international flights to Hong Kong, Kuala Lumpur, Tokyo, Qatar, Seoul, and Singapore as well as direct transfer flights via Manila�s Ninoy Aquino Internatinal Airport that connects the city to other destinations in the world. Advantage "Cebu is manila minus the mayhem." It is the country\'s center of education outside the capital. It has nine universities and a dozen other schools and colleges specializing in Medicine, Engineering, Nautical courses, Nursing, Law, Computer and IT. Cebu City boasts of its highly skilled labor pool, lower cost structure, strong education system, and solid infrastructure. The city has one of the fastest growing economies with 21 ITES companies located in the area and five Philippine Economic Zone Authorities.

properties.name: CLARK SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONE
properties.description: Posted by Mnpc2312Clark was a former US air base that has been redeveloped into a major Freeport. It was perhaps the most urbanized military facility in history and was the largest American base overseas. The base was later converted into a special economic zone after the American military left the Philippines in 1992. Access Clark is about 80 km north of Manila. Diosdado Macapagal International Airport offers international flights. It is only 31/2 hours away from Hong Kong, Taiwan, Singapore, Japan, and Korea. Cebu Pacific also offers local daily flights to Cebu City. Advantage Clark Air Field has excellent technology parks, a strong Western heritage, excellent infrastructure, and a committed, supportive local government. The city is also developing a master economic development plan that includes construction of several special economic zones, airports, and commercial complexes.

properties.name: DAVAO CITY
properties.description: Posted by Mnpc2312Davao is strategically located in the Southeastern part of Mindanao. Its location makes it the center of trade not only in the southern Mindanao region but also in the East ASEAN growth area. Access Davao�s international airport provides international flights to/from Indonesia and Singapore and also daily domestic flights. Advantage The city provides a high-quality labor pool with call center applicants having the highest pass rates in the country. It is one of the centers of BPO operations in the Philippines. Davao City has a high literacy rate at 98.05% and has 46 colleges and universities.

properties.name: DUMAGUETE
properties.description: Posted by Mnpc2312The Americans established a civil government in the province of Negros Oriental, where Dumaguete is located, on May 1, 1901. When World War II broke out, the Japanese Imperial Forces occupied the city. It was liberated on April 26, 1945 by the combined forces of the U.S. Army and the Filipino guerrillas. Access Daily flights to and from Manila are available. Advantage Dumaguete enjoys a vibrant economy with an influx of investors in business process outsourcing. The city�s robust telecommunication infrastructure connects the city not only to Manila and Cebu but also to Mindanao. The high-capacity network consists of microwave and fiber-optic links. The total capacity of these fiber links is 320 Gbps that translates to 4.5 million high quality data and voice lines. The city is also known as the University City with seven universities and colleges. The large Siliman University campus dominates Dumaguete with the Siliman Information Technology program receiving 100% rating from CHED.

properties.name: ILOILO CITY
properties.description: Posted by Mnpc2312Iloilo city’s strategically located at the center of the country. It is the regional center and the main economic hub of the Western Visayas region. Historically, Iloilo was one of the major agricultural centers of the country during the Spanish and American colonial periods. Access Domestic flights to/from Manila and Cebu are available daily and takes only 55 minutes. Advantage The city�s outstanding port facilities, extensive infrastructure, modern telecommunications system and reliable utilities make it an ideal investment location for BPO. Business opportunities thrive in the city where industrial centers and investment areas flourish.

properties.name: METRO MANILA
properties.description: Posted by Mnpc2312The first wave of BPO operations started in the country’s capital, Metro Manila. The city now has over 80 voice-based contact-centers located throughout the city’s districts: Makati, Ortigas, Eastwood, Alabang and Quezon City.

properties.name: SUBIC BAY FREEPORT
properties.description: Posted by Mnpc2312Subic Bay Freeport Zone is an evolving industrial zone and resort area with a number of hotels and casinos. It was formerly the site of a major United States Navy base which was once the largest US military base in Asia. Access Chartered flights are provided to/from the area. Advantage Subic is home to a large pool of highly proficient, motivated, and professional workforce. Subic Bay has a veritable edge as an investment area because of its Freeport status. It is considered a special customs territory where there is free flow of goods and capital equipment. ipment.
